meanings.definition: Resembling a cumulus cloud in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy pillow was cumuliform, just like a big cloud in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a cumuliform landscape with puffy white clouds.
meanings.sent3: The cumuliform marshmallows in the hot chocolate looked like mini clouds floating on top.
meanings.sent4: Her cumuliform hair billowed around her face like a soft cloud.
meanings.sent5: The cumuliform shape of the cake made it look like a delicious cloud ready to be eaten.

meanings.definition: Having the shape or appearance of a cumulus cloud.
meanings.sent1: The cotton candy was cumuliform, resembling a fluffy cloud in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The cumuliform curtains in the room added a dreamy touch to the decor.
meanings.sent3: The cumuliform foam on top of the latte looked like a tiny cloud floating on the coffee.
meanings.sent4: Her cumuliform dress flowed around her like a cloud as she danced.
meanings.sent5: The cumuliform pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel like a cozy cloud sanctuary.
